meanings.definition: A circular decoration resembling a rose window
meanings.sent1: The beautiful rosace on the ceiling added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: She wore a lovely rosace pendant around her neck.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with a rosace made of colorful icing.
meanings.sent4: The rosace of light from the chandelier filled the room with a warm glow.
meanings.sent5: The intricate rosace design on the floor caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The delicate rosace on the vase made it look more charming.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with rosace patterns on the fences.
meanings.sent3: She wore a beautiful rosace hairpin that sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The rosace pattern on the fabric gave the dress a unique look.
meanings.sent5: The rosace on the doorknob made it easy to identify the right room.

meanings.definition: A circular window with mullions radiating like the petals of a rose
meanings.sent1: The old church had a stunning rosace that let in colorful light.
meanings.sent2: The rosace in the cathedral was a masterpiece of architectural design.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat by the rosace, watching the birds outside.
meanings.sent4: The rosace in the tower looked like a giant flower blooming in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The rosace in the castle wall provided a glimpse of the outside world.
